title: Tales of the four seasons = Contes des quatre saisons
creator_credit: Les Films du Losange, Margaret Menegoz and Eric Rohmer
brief_description: A series of four films by Eric Rohmer on the theme of the four seasons, in which he continues his gentle studies of relationships in modern France.
